scene_description_enriched: The image depicts two birds rendered in a stylized, medieval manner. On the left, a white bird with long legs and a brown wing is shown in profile, its head turned towards the right. On the right, a bird with a white body, a red head and beak, and a blue back adorned with red spots is depicted facing left. The background is a textured, earthy tone, suggesting an outdoor setting. Below the birds, partial red lettering is visible, indicating this is likely an illuminated manuscript.
